channel.title: 心法 on Hadjshell
channel.description: Recent content in 心法 on Hadjshell

item.title: SOLID Principle
item.description: SOLID principles complement each other, and work together in union. Single Responsibility Principle Every software component should have one and only one responsibility / reason to change Group the responsibilities in a sensible way Cohesion - 内聚 The degree to which the various parts of a software component are related Example of garbage classification Aim for high cohesion Coupling - 耦合 The level of inter dependency between various software components Aim for loose coupling Changes are inevitable, so we need higher cohesion and loose coupling
